Text:
No question, this is an amazing role playing system, probably the best, most complete D20 system out there.  

There's a full version of all the campaign sources including the Dark Matter Arms and Equipment guide (full of guns and other goodies.)
http://www.btmon.com/Other/E-books/Alternity.torrent.html

Also pick up the character manager for streamlined character creation from 
http://www.thecastle.com/walter.html
Make sure you seed this stuff, it's 20 years out of print.

There's a complete version here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6226768 (It at least has 15 more files)

For some reason, it doesn't show up in the search bar...
